mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_clt (mat_id, fem_obj_id, clt_no, lay_ymd, egg_count, stat_cd, chk_yn) VALUES (#{matId}, #{femObjId}, #{cltNo}, #{layYmd}, #{eggCount}, #{statCd}, #{chkYn})
mapper.select: SELECT clt_id, mat_id, fem_obj_id, clt_no, lay_ymd, egg_count, stat_cd, chk_yn FROM tb_clt WHERE fem_obj_id = #{femObjId} ORDER BY clt_no
SELECT clt_id, mat_id, fem_obj_id, clt_no, lay_ymd, egg_count, stat_cd, chk_yn FROM tb_clt WHERE mat_id = #{matId} ORDER BY clt_no
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_clt SET mat_id = #{matId}, fem_obj_id = #{femObjId}, clt_no = #{cltNo}, lay_ymd = #{layYmd}, egg_count = #{eggCount}, stat_cd = #{statCd}, chk_yn = #{chkYn} WHERE clt_id = #{id}
